channel.title: Votalink Responder Updates
channel.description: Updates for Votalink Responder - Hands-free call pickup for Votacall webapp

item.title: Version 1.1.2 - Remap Dialog Filtering Fix
item.description:
Version 1.1.2 - Remap Dialog Filtering Fix

Fixed remap dialog filtering logic when all codes are shared

Bug Fixes:

  • Fixed remap dialog incorrectly using all call button codes when all codes were filtered out
  • Now correctly shows "None (all codes shared)" when no unique pattern is found
  • Disables "Confirm & Apply" button when no valid pattern is detected
  • Shows clear warning message when all codes are shared between call button and other buttons

Improvements:

  • Better user feedback when remapping fails to find unique pattern
  • Prevents applying invalid patterns that would match all buttons
  • Clear instructions to retry with different buttons in Step 2

Technical Details:

  • Removed incorrect fallback that used all call button codes when filtering removed everything
  • Now sets pattern to null when no unique codes remain after filtering
  • Added validation to prevent applying null/empty patterns

item.title: Version 1.1.1 - Setup Wizard and UI Fixes
item.description:
Version 1.1.1 - Setup Wizard and UI Fixes

Bug fixes and UI improvements for setup wizard and settings dialog

Bug Fixes:

  • Fixed crash when closing setup wizard before completing setup
  • Fixed console window auto-opening on startup despite "Show console" setting being off
  • Fixed checkmark selection issue in Step 3 - only one interface card shows checkmark at a time
  • Fixed taskbar icon not using custom favicon.ico

UI Improvements:

  • Fixed spacing in Settings dialog - "Settings" title no longer overlaps "Button Mode:" section
  • Fixed Step 4 spacing - description text no longer overlaps extension cards
  • Improved Step 3 interface selection - all interfaces show immediately with proper categorization
  • Enhanced checkmark removal logic - ensures only selected card shows checkmark

Setup Wizard Improvements:

  • Added graceful handling when user cancels setup - shows message for new installs, allows closing for existing configs
  • Fixed blank screen delay in Step 3 - all interfaces now display immediately
  • Improved interface categorization - unknown interfaces now properly displayed
  • Optimized card loading with batched layout operations for faster rendering

Technical Details:

  • Added null checks and error handling in setup wizard cleanup methods
  • Fixed form Icon property to use custom favicon.ico for taskbar display
  • Improved checkmark visibility management with recursive search through all controls
  • Added proper spacing calculations for dynamic content in dialogs

item.title: Version 1.1.0 - Settings UI Improvements
item.description:
Version 1.1.0 - Settings UI Improvements

Enhanced Settings dialog with manual update check and improved layout

New Features:

  • Added manual "Check for Updates" button in Settings panel
  • Button provides visual feedback during update check (shows "Checking..." state)
  • Improved button visibility with refresh icon and bold styling

UI Improvements:

  • Optimized Settings dialog layout to fit all content without scrolling
  • Reduced panel heights and spacing for better space utilization
  • Moved Updates section to more prominent position (before Display Options)
  • Removed unnecessary scrollbars - all settings now visible at once
  • Improved visual hierarchy with better spacing and sizing

Technical Details:

  • Settings dialog height optimized from 700px to 680px
  • Network panel: 180px → 160px height
  • Extension panel: 200px → 180px height
  • Updates panel: 120px → 100px height
  • Display panel: 80px → 70px height
  • Reduced spacing between panels for compact layout

item.title: Version 1.0.5 - Appcast Cache Fix
item.description:
Version 1.0.5 - Appcast Cache Fix

Fixed appcast caching issue that prevented update detection

Bug Fixes:

  • Fixed issue where appcast cache prevented detection of new versions
  • Added cache clearing before update checks to ensure fresh appcast download
  • Improved update detection reliability

Technical Details:

  • NetSparkle was caching the appcast, causing stale version information
  • Update check now clears the cache before downloading, ensuring latest version is detected
  • Uses reflection to access and clear the private AppCastCache property

item.title: Version 1.0.4 - ZIP Installation Handler
item.description:
Version 1.0.4 - ZIP Installation Handler

Fixed update installation with custom ZIP handler

Bug Fixes:

  • Created custom SparkleUpdater that properly handles ZIP file extraction on Windows
  • Fixed silent installation failures - ZIP files are now extracted and EXE is copied correctly
  • Added PowerShell-based extraction and file copying for ZIP updates
  • Improved error handling and logging for installation failures

Technical Details:

  • NetSparkle on Windows doesn't natively support ZIP files (only .exe, .msi, .msp)
  • Custom updater now generates PowerShell commands to extract ZIP and copy files
  • Installation process now properly extracts update package and replaces executable

Important Notes:

  • If update installation still fails, check %TEMP% for the batch script file (*.cmd)
  • Ensure the app directory is writable or run as Administrator
  • Check the log file at %APPDATA%\VotalinkResponder\netsparkle.log for details

item.title: Version 1.0.3 - Update Installation Fixes
item.description:
Version 1.0.3 - Update Installation Fixes

Improved update installation with permission checks

Bug Fixes:

  • Added permission checking before update installation
  • Warns users if executable directory is not writable
  • Provides clear instructions when update installation may fail
  • Enhanced logging for update installation diagnostics

Improvements:

  • Checks directory write permissions before attempting update
  • Shows warning dialog with solutions if permissions are insufficient
  • Logs detailed information about executable path and permissions
  • Added tooltip to update button with troubleshooting info

Important Notes:

  • If update installation fails, try running the app as Administrator
  • Alternatively, move the app to a writable location (e.g., Documents folder)
  • Check the log file at %APPDATA%\VotalinkResponder\netsparkle.log for details

item.title: Version 1.0.2 - Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements
item.description:
Version 1.0.2 - Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements

Stable release with critical fixes

Bug Fixes:

  • Fixed message listener registration issue that prevented extension from receiving button press commands
  • Fixed "Could not establish connection. Receiving end does not exist" error
  • Improved content script initialization and message handling

Performance Improvements:

  • Added DEBUG_MODE flag to disable verbose logging in production
  • Reduced console logging overhead for better performance
  • Optimized message handling and button detection

Other Improvements:

  • Added version number display in main application window title and status bar
  • Enhanced error handling and logging throughout extension
  • Improved extension path auto-detection reliability

item.title: Version 1.0.1 - Auto-detect Extension Path
item.description:
Version 1.0.1 - Auto-detect Extension Path

Update with automatic extension folder detection

New Features:

  • Automatic extension folder path detection when extension connects
  • Smart search for extension folder using unique marker
  • Auto-saves extension path to config for update system

Improvements:

  • Extension now sends fingerprint for path detection
  • App searches common locations first for faster detection
  • Falls back to broader search if not found in common locations

item.title: Version 1.0.0 - Initial Release
item.description:
Version 1.0.0 - Initial Release

Initial release of Votalink Responder

Features:

  • HID device monitoring for Yealink WH64 headsets
  • Automatic call answer/hang-up via headset button press
  • Browser extension integration for Votacall webapp
  • WebSocket communication between app and extension
  • Configurable call button pattern matching
  • Safety delay to prevent accidental actions
  • System tray support (close to tray)
  • Auto-update system via GitHub releases

Requirements:

  • Windows 7 or later
  • Yealink WH64 headset (or compatible HID device)
  • Chrome/Edge browser with Votalink extension installed
